instrucciones: For Clara to use her digital identity, she needs to import her credentials to the wallet. In this case, from the banking credentials portal
This is like adding a secure digital card to her wallet, which contains verifiable information, such as her customer credential that certifies her profession.
Below we detail the process, it's very simple.

bloques.titulo: Add it to Your Wallet App
instrucciones: Open the wallet application you have installed.
Look for the "Add" or "Import Credential" option.
Scan this QR code that will be provided to you with your mobile camera.
That easy, the credential is added to your wallet, ready to be used safely and efficiently.
